quoteLast: With enormous losses the brigades of Lennox and Malmberg have stormed the positions occupied by the artillery on the enemy's left wing, and have captured numerous guns. The thunder of cannon coming from the valley can be distinctly heard here on the heights. Fisher's division has signaled that they have successfully driven back the enemy.
title: Banzai! by Parabellum
author: Grautoff, Ferdinand Heinrich, 1871-1935
